greet.text: Hello! This is Gaya Bot. How can I help you today?

admission_details.text: To apply for admission, you'll need a Rank Card, Allotment Cards, transcripts, and an application form.

placement_details.text: The placement cell at GVPCE provides training and placement opportunities to students.

get_results_page.text: Results are available at the following link.

college_events.text: Active Events can be viewed at the following link.

college_facilities.text: GVPCE(A) provides various facilities like Labs, Hostel, Sports, Gym, and Transport.

certificates.text: For Certificate related queries, contact the Administrative Office at B2.

contact_information.text: For any queries regarding the college, contact the Administrative Office.

transfer_and_migration.text: For Transfer and Migration related queries, contact the respective Department Offices.

iic.text: IIC (Institution's Innovation Council) promotes innovation, entrepreneurship, and startup culture.

alumni.text: To connect with GVPCE Alumni, visit the following link.

internships.text: GVPCE(A) encourages students to take up internships to gain practical industry experience.

e_mobility.text: E-Mobility refers to the use of electric vehicles (EVs) as a sustainable alternative.

apssdc.text: APPSDC enhances students' employability by providing industry-relevant skill training.

anti_ragging.text: GVPCE(A) follows a strict Anti-Ragging policy in accordance with UGC guidelines.

iqac.text: IQAC ensures continuous academic and administrative improvement at GVPCE(A).

cfii.text: CFII promotes innovation, entrepreneurship, and industry partnerships at GVPCE(A).

magazine.text: The College Magazine showcases the talents, achievements, and creative works of students and faculty.

cfsr.text: More details about CFSR can be found here.

default.text: Sorry, I don't understand your query. Can you please rephrase it?
